name: Mer World Problems
description:
Controls - 

  • If you are Human 
    •  Place your hand on the arrow keys.
    • Press arrow keys.
  • If you are Merfolk
    • Follow the same instructions as human, you're not that special. 
  • If you are a fish 
    • Sorry - I have no control tips for you, other than just flop and hope.

Originally started creating for "Mer-May", didn't happen. 

Then was going to submit as part of "Sea" Bitsy Jam, didn't happen. 

But hey! But I've finally finished it in *insert current time here* 

Dedicated to my friends - with love.
